sentences.en: Giving up smoking had a magical effect on his stamina.
sentences.cn: 戒烟神奇地增强了他的体力.

sentences.en: Her words had a magical effect on us.
sentences.cn: 她的话对我们有一种魔力般的作用。

sentences.en: How prosaic, and yet how magical such paragraphs are!
sentences.cn: 这样的段落是多么平淡, 又多么不可思议 啊 !

sentences.en: I never thought that laughter has such a magical effect.
sentences.cn: 我不相信笑还能有这样的神奇效应.

sentences.en: I used to believe my mother had magical powers.
sentences.cn: 我以前一直相信我母亲有奇妙的魔力.

sentences.en: I'm going to Magical English School, but I got lost.
sentences.cn: 我准备去魔法英语学校, 但我迷路了.

sentences.en: In addition to the impressiveness of the settings , there is a use of the camera which at times seems magical.
sentences.cn: 除了布景的感染力外, 摄影机的使用技巧有时显出不可思议的效果.

sentences.en: In front of me was a large building which displayed the magical name.
sentences.cn: 前面是一幢大楼,上面那个具有魅力的名字映入了我的眼帘.

sentences.en: Magical properties are sometimes claimed for certain medicines.
sentences.cn: 某些药物被认为有时具有神奇的效应.

sentences.en: Miracles are not generally regarded as magical. Nevertheless, they do partake of the same nature.
sentences.cn: 奇迹一般不会被认为是魔法使然，不过二者在本质上有点相似。

sentences.en: Products that meet goals with the minimum of hassle and intrusion seem almost magical to users.
sentences.cn: 对用户来说,产品实现目标并只受到最小的侵扰几乎是魔术般的.

sentences.en: that magical evening we spent together
sentences.cn: 我们一起度过的那个美妙夜晚

sentences.en: The beautiful island of Cyprus is a magical place to get married.
sentences.cn: 美丽的塞浦路斯岛是缔结良缘的美妙之地。

sentences.en: The effect of the medicine on the sick man was magical.
sentences.cn: 药对病人的效力是不可思议的.

sentences.en: The story is a magical mix of fantasy and reality.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是幻想与现实的奇妙结合。

sentences.en: Thousands of tourists visIt'stonehenge every year and say the place feels magical.
sentences.cn: 每年,成千上万名参观巨石阵的游客都坦承此地具有魔力.

words.tran_cn: 不可思议的；有魔力的；魔术的

trans.tran_cn: 魔力的，不可思议的，迷人的，神，幻，神奇
trans.tran_en: relating to magic or able to do magic
